name: BestFacts
0:
”Alexa, open Best Facts”
”Alexa, tell Best Facts to give me a fact”
”Alexa, ask Best Facts to give me something”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: best facts
des: Open up this skill to see how many of these obscure and crazy facts that you know, you may be surprised to hear something that may throw you out of your seat. Open it up in front of friends and family to stay entertained for hours on end!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
